mapper.select: select count(1) from t_blog where is_delete = 0 and id = #{id}

select b.id as id,b.created_at as createdAt,b.created_by as createdBy,b.updated_at as updatedAt, b.updated_by as updatedBy,b.title as title,b.author as author,b.content as content, ifnull(b.like_num,0) as likeNum,ifnull(b.browse_num,0) as browseNum,b.tag_id as tagId, b.tag_name as tagName from t_blog b where b.is_delete = 0
and b.title LIKE concat(concat('%',#{title}),'%')
and b.content LIKE concat(concat('%',#{content}),'%')
order by b.created_at

select b.id as id,b.created_at as createdAt,b.created_by as createdBy,b.updated_at as updatedAt, b.updated_by as updatedBy,b.title as title,b.author as author,b.content as content, ifnull(b.like_num,0) as likeNum,ifnull(b.browse_num,0) as browseNum,b.tag_id as tagId, b.tag_name as tagName from t_blog b where b.is_delete = 0
and b.title LIKE concat(concat('%',#{title}),'%')
and b.content LIKE concat(concat('%',#{content}),'%')
and find_in_set(#{tagName}, b.tag_name)

select b.id as id,b.created_at as createdAt,b.created_by as createdBy,b.updated_at as updatedAt, b.updated_by as updatedBy,b.title as title,b.author as author,b.content as content, ifnull(b.like_num,0) as likeNum,ifnull(b.browse_num,0) as browseNum,b.tag_id as tagId, b.tag_name as tagName from t_blog b where b.is_delete = 0 and b.id = #{id}
